---
title: "DOI to Bib"
author: "Lyndon Estes"
date: "May 31, 2016"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(rcrossref)
library(readxl)
library(data.table)

dois <- read_excel("external/data/result/doi-title.xlsx")
# fileConn <- file("paper/other/timpaul.bib")
f <- "paper/other/timpaul.bib"
for(i in 1:nrow(dois)) {
  bib <- cr_cn(dois = dois$doi[i], format = "bibtex")
  cat(cr_cn(dois = dois$doi[i], format = "bibtex"), file = f, append = TRUE, 
      "\n\n")
}

```
